title: When you realize you probably shouldn't play with people that many Divisions higher than you...
body:
...especially not in a party where the MMR gets bumped even higher.

This Diamond and Plat stuff with GD is just too much for me. Its basically a slaughter every game - I'm fairly certain every single one of the dozen or so matches has been a loss.

The one Gold game with some of the others was nice. Was actually able to be competitive and not get my ass completely shredded and contribute. But I can't even do Support in these Dia/Plat games.
